selfEnrollRequest.title: FABRIC Self Signup
selfEnrollRequest.content:
Dear Experimenter,

Welcome to FABRIC. We noticed you are not yet registered with FABRIC. In order for you to begin using FABRIC you must go through a 3-step guided enrollment workflow. Clicking the Signup button below will take you to the first step of this process.

If you have already started the enrollment process and are waiting for the approval, please continue to check your email for an approval message. We aim to process enrollment requests within one business day. You will be able to login after receiving this approval.

Please note: you will always use your institutional credentials to login to FABRIC portal via your institution's Identity Provider - we do not and will never store your password or login information. Any password changes that you go through with your institutional account will also affect how you login to the FABRIC portal.

projectLeadDescription: Project Lead can create new projects, designate Project Owner(s)  and invite regular members into a project. Faculty or senior staff at universities can request this role.
facilityOperatorDescription: Facility Operator is a ‘superuser’ allowed to manipulate any project. This role is reserved for FABRIC staff.
